title._content: Image taken from page 161 of 'Our Army on the Rio Grande: ... with descriptions of the battles of Palo Alto and Resaca de la Palma, the bombardment of Fort Brown, and the ceremonies of the surrender of Matamoros, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Our Army on the Rio Grande: ... with descriptions of the battles of Palo Alto and Resaca de la Palma, the bombardment of Fort Brown, and the ceremonies of the surrender of Matamoros, etc" Author: THORPE, Thomas Bangs. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9771.b.24." Page: 161 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1846 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003630838 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
